articles.title: HDFC Bank loans grow by 21% y-o-y, deposits by 17% - Moneycontrol
articles.description: As per the bank's internal business classification, retail loans grew by around 15  percent over March 31, 2021 and around five percent over December 31, 2021.
articles.content: Country's largest private sector lender, HDFC Bank on April 3 said its loan book has grown by 21 percent on a year-on-year basis to Rs 13.69 lakh crore as on March, 31. On a quarter-on-quarter basis,… [+1864 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: ONGC to see $3 billion rise in earnings, Reliance $1.5 billion from gas price hike - Economic Times
articles.description: The government from April 1 increased the gas price paid to producers of oil and regulated fields from $2.9 per million British thermal units to $6.10, a record high.
articles.content: State-owned Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC) is likely to see a $3 billion (about Rs 23,000 crore) rise in its annual earnings from the more than doubling of the price of natural gas it produce… [+4205 chars]
